    • Uses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.chart

      Subclasses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.chart 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ChartController
      The Chart Controller class is responsible for receiving, generating and processing chart view events and, if necessary, manipulating data in the model.

    • Uses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.desktop

      Subclasses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.desktop 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DesktopController
      The desktop controller class is responsible for constructing the GUI controller classes and executing certain calls of the ControllerBaseDesktop class

    • Uses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.general

      Subclasses of ControllerBase in stocker.controller.general 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ControllerBaseDesktop
      This class sets up the base for the DesktopController class.
      class  ControllerBaseInternal
      This class sets up the base for the gui controllers WatchlistController, SearchController, ChartController and PropertiesController.
